glsa.title: Star: Directory traversal vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: A directory traversal vulnerability has been discovered in Star.

background.p: The Star program provides the ability to create and extract tar archives.

description.p: Robert Buchholz of the Gentoo Security team discovered a directory traversal vulnerability in the has_dotdot() function which does not identify //.. (slash slash dot dot) sequences in file names inside tar files.

impact.p: By enticing a user to extract a specially crafted tar archive, a remote attacker could extract files to arbitrary locations outside of the specified directory with the permissions of the user running Star.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
